episodes.title: TOP 5 Questions Jehovah's Witnesses CANNOT Answer
episodes.description:
Jehovah's Witnesses are programmed to believe that individuals who leave their religion are proud, dishonest, and sinful. The truth is that members are leaving in droves because there exists numerous serious and significant questions which go outside the organizations mental programming, and the answers are devastating. In this video I present my top 5. 

---------------- ENJOY THIS VIDEO? --------------

episodes.title: My Apostate Warning Talk: SECRET RECORDING Debunked
episodes.description:
Jehovah's Witnesses do not inform you that they're going to do an apostate warning talk about you to the congregation, nor do they give you the opportunity to defend yourself in a public setting. It's a good job therefore that I managed to record most of mine so that I can seize that opportunity now. 

In this video I dissect the talk and address two important questions: Is what this elder saying actually true? And what is he hoping his words will achieve in the minds of the congregation?
